alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 3:13PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 400 PM MST... At 313 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Florence Junction, or 9 miles northeast of Florence, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence. This includes AZ Route 79 between mile markers 132 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Superior
